text: Sir George Herbert Walter, KNH (8 September 1928 - 4 March 2008) was an Antiguan politician of the Progressive Labour Movement and Prime Minister of Antigua and Barbuda from 14 February 1971 to 1 February 1976. In 2008, he was posthumously made a Knight of the Order of the National Hero (KNH) by his native country Antigua and Barbuda to become the country's fifth national hero. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2008 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Antigua and Barbuda
title: George Walter
